entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
